entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Drifting snow. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 22 January 2023
